function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor IAQ due to inefficient ventilation leading to increased spread of infection","Impact":"Adverse health effects on occupants, decreased comfort, satisfaction, and productivity","Mitigation":"Integrating sound IAQ strategies into building design, prioritizing design strategies to improve IAQ","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation systems, air filtration, air cleaning technologies","People":"Occupants, public health workers, urban planners, architects","Owner":"Building designers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and air quality exacerbating the spread of airborne viruses","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne transmission of viruses like SARS-CoV-2","Mitigation":"Implementing source control, designing effective ventilation systems, air cleaning","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation systems, air filtration, air cleaning technologies","People":"Occupants, public health workers, urban planners, architects","Owner":"Building designers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"The need for targeted policy changes across public health, urban planning, and architectural design sectors","Impact":"Effective implementation of IAQ improvement strategies, reduction of risk for occupants","Mitigation":"Supporting and implementing targeted policy changes, collaboration between sectors","Technologies":"Policy frameworks, collaboration platforms, data analytics for impact assessment","People":"Public health officials, urban planners, architects, policymakers","Owner":"Governments, organizations"}]}
